description:
**Context/Current situation**

On the frontend we have different kind of filteroptions which customers can use to navigate through a listerpage. The filteroptions are available and created in Tweakiwse.

**Desired situation**

We want to investigate the possibility to add new filteroptions. See the list of characteristics which we want to use as a filteroption.

Note 1: these characteristics are not mandatory and therefor not always used for each article

Note 2: not all of these charecyeristics are not available yet in Commercetools. The JOG team first need to add these characteristics in Channable. (PIM > Channable > CT)

* Length
* Fit
* Waist
* Closure
* Leg Fit
* Neck Line
* Sleeve description
* Webcolor
* Color Child
* Sustainability
* Fabric
* Pattern
* Print

Once these characteristics  are available in Tweakwise we can create new filteroptions

An overview of the available article properties and there availablity in Inriver, Channable and Commercetools:

**Next steps**

* Analyses impact [https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1158](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1158) (RB2)
* Process article variables Inriver > Channable (Dennis/JOG-IT)
* Process article variables Channable > Commercetools (Dennis)
* Create CT fields and adjust product import CT (RB2)
* Process article variables CT > Tweakwise (RB2)
* Adjust filteroptions (JOG/RB2)
title: Add new filteroptions in Tweakwise | BE & FE

description:
As a webshop manager, we want to be able to use Squeezly to see what customers have on their favorite lists. We want to use this information for commercial purposes.

This autumn we want to encourage customers to create a favorite list by linking it to a competition. Among all created favorite lists, one customer is selected to win his entire list.
title: Ability to view favorites list in Squeezely
Automatically updating the data in Squeezly (for example adress change or loyalty points)
Set calculated fields in Squeezly
SRS and Squeezly connection (offline data)
Data import from Deploytec and DMP to Squeezly

description:
Problem: Last weekend we had a family weekend at Garcia's. This campaign ran until Sunday 16 June. New banners were scheduled for Monday. However, the images on the website were not updated. The old campaign images remained. Only after all images had been manually triggered some of the the changes become visible on the website after an hour. Manually triggering the images also did not work with all images, some were still incorrect this morning.

Question: How come the planned images were not shown? How can we prevent this in the future?

Scope: All Garcia websites

![image-20240614-131516.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/e8f4359d-f606-4465-868a-3eb6aa1f6958/141bb8f7-9e95-429c-b48f-3a5621cfb7b3)

description:
**Context**

When a customer with an account has forgotten his password, he can activate the ‘forgot my password’ functionality. The customer will receive an email with a link to reset his/her password

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/6c287e3e-1cc0-4ee6-b205-8f003346876f/99d7dc44-eb63-48e4-bad2-854e7c4ddc90)

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/deb7b775-19df-4832-b2fc-3b1b69f2f1e6/a867aa93-e89c-43f3-bc5f-53c12e0e239b)

**Current situation**

the layout of this email is outdated. For example the old JC logo is used. But there are also url-links in the email that are not actual anymore

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/3e4a533e-a45d-45e3-9660-335bc9effc81/7d739a50-4163-4147-b3f8-2c68788b29a7)

**Desired situation**

We want to adjust the reset my password email. We can deliver a design with the new layout and links. But maybe it would be better if we can maintain this email (text, links, font, images) ourselves.

Could you investigate the possibilities if and how we can maintain this email ourselves

![image-20240528-133014.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/e7bf0859-3423-487a-9ec6-fef8fef46b24/1cf5aa5c-39eb-4405-8030-834144af2a1c)

![image-20240611-053052.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/18958053-0de0-4ab7-a3a1-6c0e7ab31cd7/28ff5f5a-fd1f-4533-ac79-87f676921648)
title: Change layout "forgot my password" email | BE

description:
**Context/Current situation**

Based on research and analysis we want to adjust the current flow of adding products to your cart and the cartpage. We want to make it more obvious and easy for a customer.

With this ticket we want to change the functionality and styling/font of this process.

**Desired situation**

The JOG team made a new design for the cartpage.

At this point there is a design for Garcia available. The design for Jeans Centre will follow asap and will be added to this ticket

[WInkelmand – Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/No5eWWzJtvvksFRK4TOB9f/WInkelmand?type=design&node-id=0-1&mode=design&t=WSMOQulcSKYub3nn-0)

<ins>Some remarks for this new design and functionality:</ins>

* The item is added to the Cart-popup
* We want to show max.2,5 item in the Cart-pop-up
* We want to show 2 buttons on the Cart-popup
  * ~~Afrekenen (-> go directly to first step of checkout or login)~~
  * Naar winkelmand (-> go to the cartpage)
* Please take note of all the text, styling and font changes

**Steps for PRD release**

* We want to use feature flagging for this new feature
* After the first PRD release the new functionality will only be effective for JOG members
* Once we have tested it on PRD successfully we can show it to a % of real customers

**EDIT after refinement**

The extra button on the cartpage to go directly to the checkout will be done in a next phase. This is beacuse at the point a customer goes to the cartpage there is a calculation done on availability of products. We need to find a way to do the same as a customer goes directly to the checkout
title: Redesign Cart-popup | FE

description:
**Context/Current situation**

Based on research and analysis we want to adjust the current flow of adding products to your cart and the cartpage. We want to make it more obvious and easy for a customer.

With this ticket we want to change the functionality and styling/font of this process.

**Desired situation**

The JOG team made a new design for the cartpage.

At this point there is a design for Garcia available. The design for Jeans Centre will follow asap and will be added to this ticket

[WInkelmand – Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/No5eWWzJtvvksFRK4TOB9f/WInkelmand?type=design&node-id=0-1&mode=design&t=WSMOQulcSKYub3nn-0)

<ins>Some remarks for this new design and functionality:</ins>

* After you added an item to your cart
  * The amount in the Cart-icon is changed (+1)
  * The added item is shown in the cart-popup with the message “Toegevoegd aan winkelmand”
  * The Cart-popup disappears after X-seconds (is it possible that JOG can configure the time/seconds that the popup will be in screen?)

**Steps for PRD release**

* We want to use feature flagging for this new feature
* After the first PRD release the new functionality will only be effective for JOG members
* Once we have tested it on PRD successfully we can show it to a % of real customers

description:

The switch is configured with ENV on the following lambdas:

OrderConfirmationQHandler
PaymentHandlers
CartApplyGiftcard
CartRemoveGiftcard
ReplicateCartLambda
AllocateJcCardQHandler
CartRemoveVoucher
CartApplyVoucher

description:
This is a follow-up on spike: [https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1077](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1077)

~~--~~

**Context**

Due to changing legislation we have to inform customers more about changing prices. We allready added the original price for a product ([https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-955](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-955) )

**Desired**

We also have to inform customers about the lowest price in the last 30 days for a product. This is a dynamic price and is determied by the moment the customers visit the Lister- or Productdetailpage

The JOG team will also create a design on how we can show this to the customers
It will look a bit like this example

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/ab929981-6ee0-4901-8802-8dfbf3f35b60/e4eaf8f8-11db-4801-bd96-e15009e813e4)

~~--~~

**Solution**

1. Create a custom field at the product level (the price is the same across all SKUs) to store the price list of the last 30 days, including the lowest price of them
2. Modify the product feed when exporting XML.
3. Include a new field in the results returned by the Tweakwise search.
4. Create a daily cron job to maintain the price list of each product.Show lowest price in last 30 days for products | BE & FE

![image-20240620-071636.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/92301a7f-3f7e-4a4f-8d74-ff6bf7983cd6/2b9a3845-db9d-43aa-87d3-5bd7c84e2fe5)

![image-20240702-065853.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/dc9d6e0b-20a0-424d-b734-dbf0e1cc7081/e063559e-9012-4926-8d32-db4e82b232ab)
title: Show lowest price in last 30 days for products | BE & FE

description:
Since yesterday we see that if we make a change (add url, images, etc) in a Prismic document and we move on to the next change the lprevious change is reverted. The only solution is now that we save after each change in a document. This could work as a workaround but is not a structural solution.

I received a screenrecording and I could also reproduce the issue myself on PRD and ACC

[Screen Recording 2024-04-24 at 15.03.24.mov](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/rest/api/2/attachment/content/66304)
title: Changes made in Prismic are not saved and reverted wiuth the last change

description:
**Context/Current situation**

Based on research and analysis we want to adjust the current flow of adding products to your cart and the cartpage. We want to make it more obvious and easy for a customer.

With this ticket we want to change the functionality and styling/font of this process.

**Desired situation**

The JOG team made a new design for the cartpage.

At this point there is a design for Garcia available. The design for Jeans Centre will follow asap and will be added to this ticket

[WInkelmand – Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/No5eWWzJtvvksFRK4TOB9f/WInkelmand?type=design&node-id=0-1&mode=design&t=WSMOQulcSKYub3nn-0)

<ins>Some remarks for this new design and functionality:</ins>

* In the cartpage it must be possible to move an item to the Wishlist.
  * If a customer clicks on the Wishlist-icon the item is removed from the cart and moved to the Wishlist
* In the cartpage the serviceinformation is folded and can be unfold by the customer
* In the cartpage it should be possible to change the amount of a product
* Please take note of all the text, styling and font changes

**Steps for PRD release**

* We want to use feature flagging for this new feature
* After the first PRD release the new functionality will only be effective for JOG members
* Once we have tested it on PRD successfully we can show it to a % of real customers

![Discount code.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/1ce6083f-2bbb-4dbd-b32a-519a801154f5/b8d4ded1-962a-4c6a-ab1b-c97b36eb8a54)

description:
**Current situation**

There is allready a ticket for the Back button in My account_Returns that didn’t result in 1 step back. This is ticket [https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1160](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1160)

But now I noticed the same issue for the Guest return proces. See enclosed screenshot

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/e8118743-fc66-4062-a6af-6861f2bcc2b5/3674dc50-1ed1-4dcb-b3f8-700a4c840961)

**Steps to reproduce**

* Go to [RETOURNEREN ALS GAST (jeanscentre.nl)](https://acceptance.jeanscentre.nl/retour)
* Use order: 50004040
* And email adress: [mennowestgeest<ins>test18042024@gmail.com](mailto:mennowestgeest%3C/ins%3Etest18042024@gmail.com)
* Select button <ARTIKEL(EN) RETOURNEREN)
* Now try to use Back-button
* Result: No result

**Desired situation**

When a customer uses the Back-button, the customer should go 1 step back
title: Back-button in Return as guest doesn't result in 1 step back | FE

description:
**Current situation**

since the release of [https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1110](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1110) we see a change for Jeans Centre. In the old version the 4 CTA buttons where placed next to each other and now the fouth button is placed under the other 3 buttons. We have reproduced this behaviour on ACC

\[Jeans Centre \]( Nieuwe kleding en jeans voor het hele gezin bij Jeans Centre! | There for You|[https://acceptance.jeanscentre.nl/](https://acceptance.jeanscentre.nl/))

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/14343e52-7da9-4c59-b78c-4b73450da74d/3d402a5d-b469-4eed-aab3-d3a69663bc77)

**Desired situation**

If possible place the 4 buttons next to each other
title: Prismic: button for mobile device always visible | FE

description:
*As a mobile user I want to be able to contact JeansCentre customer care through WhatsApp*

## **Business value**

Whataspp is very common and easy to use to contact customer care. In order to help the customer make the right product selection or answer any other question, the WhatsApp icon has to be shown on the mobile pages.

When the user clicks on the WhatsApp icon an overlay opens where the user can interact with customer care (see screenshot).

## **Integration**

We have already implemented a script, see [https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-440](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-440)

However, this script is no longer available so we have to look for another solution.

We now have found a script via \[WhatsApp Chat Button \]( Add a Chat Button to Your Website | Wati|[https://www.wati.io/whatsapp-chat-button/](https://www.wati.io/whatsapp-chat-button/))

## **Desired**

Could you investigate the solution offered by Wati

**AC**

* The WhatsApp functionality should only be enabled for the JeansCentre mobile site
* The script has to be hosted on our own servers and must be accessible to the user
* The whatsapp icon has to be returned on every page (on the bottom right corner)
* When the user closes the chat functionality, the user is returned to the page where he started the chat functionality on
title: re-Implement Whatsapp on Jeans Centre | FE

description:
**Context**

we have been informed by Tweakwise that they see a high load of traffic on some specific moments. And they are a bit concerned this could potentially bot traffic.

See enclosed document for the analysis performed by Tweakwise support

[Analysis TW concerning high performance peaks.docx](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/rest/api/2/attachment/content/65790)

The two moments to which Tweakiwse indicates are exactly the days that we did a PRD release. And also the timing could point to the moment that RB2 was busy with the PRD release.

However, I do like the observation made by Tweakwise.

**Desired**

Could you check the investigation made by Tweakwise and see if we have issues with bot traffic or that it is related to the PRD release
title: Investigate high traffic load Tweakwise | BE

description:
**Context (related to GTM configuration)**

We use Awin for our affiliate marketing. Via those affiliates customers got redirected to the webshops of JC and Garcia. In order to meet the new cookie regulations we have to change this to Server to Server tracking.

Server to Server Tracking is a mandatory component of tracking. The requirement is that conversion data is sent (via HTTP response) directly from your server to Awin’s servers. To build the Server to Server request, use the same parameters as the Fall-back Conversion pixel

**Goal**

Maintain future Tracking quality keeping data usable & available within the Awin Network. We can use GTM for the changes needed for the Server to Server tracking.

**Current situation**

For Garcia there is a Server Side container available in GTM. See;

[https://tagmanager.google.com/#/container/accounts/2533235092/containers/67911077/workspaces/7](https://tagmanager.google.com/#/container/accounts/2533235092/containers/67911077/workspaces/7)

However, the set up for this container is not as expected.

For JC there is no Server Side container available yet in GTM

**Desired situation**

1. undo the settings for the Server Side container for Garcia
2. Implement the Awin Server Side tracking in GTM based on the documentation which we received from Awin

See the documentation of Awin how to implement the server to server tracking

[https://wiki.awin.com/index.php/Server_to_Server_Tracking](https://wiki.awin.com/index.php/Server_to_Server_Tracking)

**JEANS** CENTRE: advertiserId = 9247

**GARCIA NL & BE:** advertiserId = 19587

**GARCIA DE:** advertiserId = 21856

**Solution**

1. When create order from cart, add a record in dynamodb with orderid and clickid
2. create a cron job running on dayly basis to handle the order created with clickid
3. NOTE: The total amout shuld be excluding shipping and any other extra fees

Commission mode: single

![image-20240327-030013.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/ad01c8d2-ec95-4ac5-966a-c01899b7eeec/ef506a57-fe4a-42dd-b5ab-fd0836d8a1c4)
title: Implement Awin Server to server tracking | BE

description:
**Context**

We use Trusted Shops on both the webshop of JC and Garcia as a quality mark and for gathering product reviews. For gathering product reviews there is an automated process in Trusted Shops that send out emails to customers after X-days and the customer is asked to write a review about the bought products

**Current situation**

In the current situation we send out an email after X-days. This is a standard procedure. However, due to issues (manco or delay in delivery) it could be that the customer did not receive the products (yet). Besides that the current email is a standard email template and we can not adjust the text in this email

**Desired situation**

It is possible to send out the product review-email based on the status of the order and also to adjust the text in the email. This can be done if we make use of the API’s provided by Trusted Shops.

See the attached documention on how to proceed with the Trusted Shops API’s

[Introduction (etrusted.com)](https://developers.etrusted.com/reference/api-introduction)

**EDIT 01-03-24**: at this point CT doesn’t know the orderstatus. The order status is known in OMS (RU). However, an order can be delivered in multiple packages so it can be hard to determine the status of an order. Therefor, RU determines the orderline status.

I will check with Trusted Shops / JOG on how to proceed

**EDIT 04-03-24**: I will close this ticket with status <Won’t Do>. The order status is known by RU. I will check with them if they can process the orderstatus with Trusted Shops
[Document Trusted Shops - send out productreview.docx](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/rest/api/2/attachment/content/65190)
title: WIP: Send Trusted Shops review requests based on status

description:
**Context**

sometimes orders are not automatically processed from CT to OMS. There can be several reasons why a order is not processed to OMS. For example;

* missing address
* wrong payment status

**Current situation**

In the current situation JOG creates a ticket and the RB2 team needs to take care of this ticket. It will always take a bit of time before a ticket will be handlked by the team. And this is also time which can be spend on new features

**Desired situation**

The best solution would be that all orders are processed automatically and succesfully to OMS. But if this is not the case, it would be helpfull if the JOG team can adjust an order and proces it to OMS and that we don’t need the assistence of the RB2 team.

Could you investigate a solution on how the JOG team can handle these orders by itself.
title: Create functionality for JOG team to process orders to OMS | BE

description:
**Context**

When a customer with an account has forgotten his password, he can activate the ‘forgot my password’ functionality. The customer will receive an email with a link to reset his/her password

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/dca7b382-a047-477f-976e-8bf6ddfc18ff/a115db01-cbea-495d-8041-a68e7d23188c)

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/8fad3cdb-9b64-40b5-b096-f4690991a1d6/9573a5ac-ef51-406c-b651-682d343c5570)

**Current situation**

the layout of this email is outdated. For example the old JC logo is used. But there are also url-links in the email that are not actual anymore

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/d83d02ea-77e2-48c4-852a-392b80d046f9/794647fe-16d5-4951-a02d-d0b4adf2adf5)

**Desired situation**

We want to adjust the reset my password email. We can deliver a design with the new layout and links. But maybe it would be better if we can maintain this email (text, links, font, images) ourselves.

Could you investigate the possibilities if and how we can maintain this email ourselves
title: Change layout "forgot my password' email | FE
PDP GARCIA-N41203-1050

description:
**Current situation**

When we want to link to a url in a Prismic document we have to add the following

[https://{site}/meisjes/teens/broeken](https://%7Bsite%7D/meisjes/teens/broeken)

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/d4d28b7f-e3db-45a4-90ef-769d5fb2a52b/e044c613-60ca-4f18-b359-4d55cf346a97)

This url is for each locale different as we use different languages. Especially for Garcia this **is a lot of work**

Note: the external Id will not change !

**Desired situation**

The External ID in Commercetools  is for each locale (language) the same. In this example;

meisjes-tieners-broeken

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/3b035ef1-6c89-4058-a557-eb2a768ee1eb/3ac15fa5-0571-480d-a9d5-d6e4ec1b7b61)

Can we use this external ID in Prismic when we want to link to a specific url. In this case we can use the same link for each locale

In this example (together with the change for [https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1029](https://rb2support.atlassian.net/browse/JOGG-1029) ) the url would be

$/meisjes-tieners-broeken

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/b9f20b5d-d0a8-42ed-826c-c8c0dff70757/af982d23-3c36-4e7e-aaa5-037e0e7cb75b)

It would be even better if we can show a dropdown menu in Prismic with the existing CT external ID’s so that we don’t make any typo’s but not sure if this is possible.

![image-20240618-112703.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/776a0f6d-c874-48e4-8277-1ab76fcf7870/e48c122f-c73f-48e3-b7ae-6c7d0b222c04)
title: Use CT External ID in Prismic for linking to a url | FE

When we add SEO text in a Prismic document and want to add a url we have to fill in the complete url.

It would help us if we can work with the placeholder https://{site}

description:
**Context**

FYAYC created an Elastic dashboard for both JC and Garcia which reflects the orders per hour. This dashboard is build based on CT orders and revenue.

Especially during campagnes JOG wants to have real time insight in the orders and revenue per hour. But we also use this dashboard when there is no campagne active. Since last week the Dashboard for JC doesn’t show the orders per hour anymore.

Desired

1. RB2 should be aware of this solution and investigate if they can take care of this Elastic dashboard
2. Solve the current issues with this Dashboard or
3. create a new tool/dashboard where we can monitor the orders and revenue per hour

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/e03b7ba7-92fd-4652-bb37-325b368388e6/9a9f4f93-06ce-4e40-bb32-771c850ce1a6)

description:
In Squeezely we want to be able to run campaigns (cross sell) on products that have been bought by the customers.

In order to feed Squeezely with the purchases in the current implementation the Squeezely API is called from the thank you page. When customers don’t end up on the thank you page because they close the tab after payment the purchase is not registered.

According Daylee a backend implementation is possible. The same data needs to be send across. Please investigate as part this spike:

* What the possibilities are and a high level effort estimation.
* Are the events triggered as expected and is all data available in the data layer. The tag in GTM is  `Squeezely - Purchase`
title: SPIKE: Investigate possibility of syncing orders from the backend to Squeezely

description:
**Context**

A customer can create an online account. With this account it makes it more easy to create orders, or to view past orders. We encourage customers to create an online account. However, it must be also possible for customers to remove their account. There is a button available in My account, but at this point their is no functionality behind this button

![](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/250daa95-09f3-496d-a439-1c7d12eead55/279ab880-16fc-40b7-957f-2abb7066974d)

**Desired**

When a customer want to remove his/her account this must possible. However, it is not neccesary to create a functionality that the account is deleted automatically. Once a customer push the button <Account verwijderen> we want to redirect the customer to a page where we explain what we (JOG) will do to remove (anonymise) the customer account.

What is needed to delete/anonymise an account. In which systems do we need to remove/anonymise an account?

**Functionality**

* When a customer uses the button <remove my account> first show a page where we can explain what will happen. This page must me maintainable in Prismic

**AC**

* Account with all its entities needs to be deleted from every system
* Delete confirmation is sent to the customer

![image-20240607-070306.png](https://uploads.linear.app/aff9d4a8-3a3a-4ee1-9970-c142ac87985d/f05c03c1-9113-4ccd-a9bb-413c9b1f7cac/d4a5ee95-c871-4a3e-ac94-d87d332a06e5)
title: How to remove My account | BE FE

description:
Steps:

1. Log in
2. Create a cart(A) and add some products
3. Apply a voucher
4. Open a Chrome Incognito window
5. Create a cart(B) as a guest add some products
6. Apply a voucher
7. Go to checkout process and try to log in
8. Cart-A and Cart-B will merged, and it will have all vouchers

Related api

/`assignCart`
title: BE: Only keep one voucher when Assign cart

description:
As a marketing coordinator I want to improve the process of approve affiliate orders and -returns for efficiency purposes.

**Context**

We use Awin for our affiliate marketing. We only pay commission to Awin on orders approved after the return period. With a full return, the commission expires completely and we pay nothing. With a partial return, the commission will be deducted and you will only pay the X% of the approved order amount

**Current situation**

At the moment we approve and change the orders in Awin <ins>manually</ins> or in Bulk. We have to do this per account (JC, Garcia NL-BE & Garcia DE) 2 times a month and cost us about an hour of work. Once before the 15<sup>th</sup> of the month and once before the last day of the month.

**Desired situation**

The Transaction Validations API allows JOG  to approve, decline, and amend transactions with the Awin API. You can also use the Transaction Validation API to group multiple validation requests into a single submission.

See enclosed document for the implementation instruction:

[https://wiki.awin.com/index.php/API_transaction_validation](https://wiki.awin.com/index.php/API_transaction_validation)

**JEANS** CENTRE: advertiserId = 9247

**GARCIA NL & BE:** advertiserId = 19587

**GARCIA DE:** advertiserId = 21856

**Dependency**

* At the moment we don’t have any return information in Commercetools. With the Custom return Theme we will make this possible via the order API from RU. Maybe it is good to start this US once this Theme is done.
* Once we will start with this US we also have to align with Awin for the authentication and testing

**Acceptance criteria**

* test with affiliate order and returns on ACC and the approval process in Awin
title: WIP: AWIN Transaction Validation API | BE

description:
We created a ticket for removing the language switcher on Garcia .nl, .be and .de. This is a first step to remove multilingual for Garcia .nl, .be and .de.

This ticket is to have a good look at all the multilingual development, documents, etc which can be removed when we stop with multilingual.

We can think of

* Prismic documents that can be removed
* Check configuration in Commercetools
* Check/cleanup code backend
* Check/cleanup sitemaps
* Check/cleanup Channable (productfeed)
* check on indexed pages in Google
title: Remove multilingual for Garcia .nl, .be and .de | FE

description:
[https://github.com/mobxjs/mobx/tree/main/packages/mobx-react-lite](https://github.com/mobxjs/mobx/tree/main/packages/mobx-react-lite) 
This is a lighter version of Mob-X, supporting functional components only and thus mostly a drop-in replacement for our situation.
It does not support the `inject` HOC, which is used still in a couple of  places and in a wrong way (both `inject` and the `useStores` hook on the same component, so inserting it twice).
title: Replace mobx-react with mobx-react-lite | FE
